docs.snippet: Ultra-nationalists are set to return to Serbia's parliament in an April 24 election after an absence of several years, boosted by growing discontent with Prime Minister Aleksandar Vucic's pro-European Union stance and austerity policies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ultra-nationalists are set to return to Serbia's parliament in an April 24 election after an absence of several years, boosted by growing discontent with Prime Minister Aleksandar Vucic's pro-European Union stance and austerity policies.

headline.main: Ultra-Nationalist Resurgence Could Complicate Serbia's EU Path
headline.print_headline: Ultra-Nationalist Resurgence Could Complicate Serbia's EU Path

docs.snippet: The pontiff visited Lesbos, the heart of Europe’s migrant crisis, asking for deeper sympathy at a moment when attitudes are hardening....
docs.lead_paragraph: The pontiff visited Lesbos, the heart of Europe’s migrant crisis, asking for deeper sympathy at a moment when attitudes are hardening.
docs.abstract: Pope Francis concludes emotional visit to Greece by bringing 12 Syrian Muslim refugees from Moria camp back with him to Rome to offer them asylum; action is intended as gesture of welcome to migrants and as means of highlighting dire circumstances they face.

headline.main: Pope Francis Takes 12 Refugees Back to Vatican After Trip to Greece
headline.print_headline: 12 Syrians Get Gift of Refuge  From the Pope

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis

byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

docs.snippet: Some members view Mr. Sanders as a once-in-a-lifetime candidate, but because of New York’s closed primary system they cannot participate in the voting next week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some members view Mr. Sanders as a once-in-a-lifetime candidate, but because of New York’s closed primary system they cannot participate in the voting next week.
docs.abstract: Members of Working Families Party, blocked from voting for Democrat Bernie Sanders in New York's closed primary, find alternative ways to support their preferred candidate; state only allows registered party members to vote in primary.

headline.main: Smitten by Bernie Sanders, Working Families Party Can’t Show It in Primary
headline.print_headline: Closed Primary Sidelines Some Sanders Supporters
